name: FRATERNAL ORDER OF POLICE, LODGE NO. 5, and Robert S. Hurst v. CITY OF PHILADELPHIA and Kevin M. Tucker. Appeal of FRATERNAL ORDER OF POLICE, LODGE NO. 5
name_abbreviation: Fraternal Order of Police v. City of Philadelphia

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDermott, zappala and papadakos, jj.

casebody.head_matter:
567 A.2d 1388
FRATERNAL ORDER OF POLICE, LODGE NO. 5, and Robert S. Hurst v. CITY OF PHILADELPHIA and Kevin M. Tucker. Appeal of FRATERNAL ORDER OF POLICE, LODGE NO. 5.

Argued Dec. 11, 1989.
Decided Jan. 5, 1990.
Robert B. Mozenter, Anthony J. Molloy, Jane R. Goldberg, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Ralph J. Teti, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDermott, zappala and papadakos, jj.
